FrontEnd

Class LEMainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrontEnd.StateLoad
      • FrontEnd.LEMainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class LEMainController
extends StateLoad
    This is the class responsible for managing the main view of the Level Editor as well as all the class interactions needed to make it work

      There were some issues with having the Canvas load in the board during the initialisation step So instead we made the board draw itself when the mouse enters the Canvas Assigns itself to onMouseEntered in the FXML

      • setEnumColors

        public void setEnumColors()
        Just removes the "player" bit from the variables of the colour that a player currently is Useful when doing CarColors.ValueOf But I didn't just want to call the car colors stuff likE "RED" "PINK" etc. in the file system
